channel.title: Bitnami on Keep calm and Write something
channel.description: Recent content in Bitnami on Keep calm and Write something

item.title: Setup hugo with bitnami chart
item.description:
bitnami repo 추가

cychong@mini1:~$ helm repo add bitnami https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami
"bitnami" has been added to your repositories

nginx chart 검색

NAME 	CHART VERSION	APP VERSION	DESCRIPTION

GitHub에 있는 bitnami helm chart repo는 아래 위치에.
https://github.com/bitnami/charts
